column4: does anyone know if its safe to create a hotspare on a different scsi channel than the array its going to be used with on a hardware raid card?
do you have a HW raid manager? what brand?
I'm using the rom manager on a adaptec 2230slp card.
you must have the hotspare disc on the same adapter. It may be on the other channel, but I would reccomand to keep it on the same.
